name: Here and There with the Mr. Men
description:
These educational games with the Mr. Men characters from Roger Hargreaves' children books are for kids aged four to 8 years. It features these fun games that also teach the principles of directions:
  • Mr. Tickle's Jigsaw Puzzle
    • - Build up Mr. Tickle from four pieces inside the square of the box.
  • Mr. Tickle and Mr Grumpy
    • - Similar to the first game, but this time Mr. Grumpy is on the inside and Mr. Tickle is outside trying to tickle him.
  • Mr Lazy
    • - Guide the worm to the red apple and drop it into the mouth of Mr. Lazy who lies under the apple tree.
  • Mr. Men versus Mr. Tickle
    • - You control four Mr. Men, moving on a draught board, who try to trap Mr. Tickle.

    The game comes with a colourful instruction booklet that explains all of the games.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, BBC Micro, MSX | Combined View

shot.caption: "Mr. Tickle's Jigsaw Puzzle"; Use the (D)own/U(p)/(R)ight/(L)eft (or the cursors) to move the positions of the doorway and the COPY or ENTER is to be use to move to the next doorway!
"Mr. Tickle's Jigsaw Puzzle"; The yellow colored pieces of Mr. Tickle will bounce back IF the doorways are not in the right position!
"Mr. Tickle and Mr. Grumpy"; You've to give all the right directions (D)own/U(p)/(R)ight/(L)eft to direct one of Mr. Tickle's hand to Mr. Tickle and move the doorway in the right direction!
"Mr. Tickle and Mr. Grumpy"; You've to give more directions than only one
"Mr. Tickle and Mr. Grumpy"; Not the right way, because one of the doorways is in the wrong direction
"Mr. Tickle and Mr. Grumpy"; Sometimes Mr. Grumpy places a chair that will stand in the way
"Mr. Tickle and Mr. Grumpy"; Let's tickle Mr. Grumpy!
"Mr. Lazy"; With the use of up (M), (L)eft and (R)ight, you've to give the right directions to the worm to get to the red apple
"Mr. Lazy"; When you give the wrong directions
Mr. Men Versus Mr. Tickle; The Mr. Men must try to trap Mr. Tickle by encircle him
Mr. Men Versus Mr. Tickle; And he slipped away!
Mr. Men Versus Mr. Tickle; We got him!
